solution_line_template: Multiplying the number of students eating at the cafeteria by three means that {multiplier_thrice} * {students_eat_cafeteria} = <<{multiplier_thrice}*{students_eat_cafeteria}={students_bring_lunch}>>{students_bring_lunch} students bring lunch.

The total number of students that eat lunch is {students_eat_cafeteria} + {students_bring_lunch} = <<{students_eat_cafeteria}+{students_bring_lunch}={total_students_eat_lunch}>>{total_students_eat_lunch} students

Since the class has {total_students_in_class} students, those who don't eat lunch are {total_students_in_class}-{total_students_eat_lunch} = <<{total_students_in_class}-{total_students_eat_lunch}={students_dont_eat_lunch}>>{students_dont_eat_lunch} students.
